definition: a street name for cocaine, to conceal one's true motives from someone, especially by elaborately feigning good intentions so as to gain an end
details:
noun
- a street name for cocaine
= example: a street name for cocaine
- precipitation falling from clouds in the form of ice crystals
= example: precipitation falling from clouds in the form of ice crystals
- a layer of snowflakes covering the ground
= example: a layer of snowflakes covering the ground
verb
- to conceal one's true motives from someone, especially by elaborately feigning good intentions so as to gain an end
= example: to conceal one's true motives from someone, especially by elaborately feigning good intentions so as to gain an end
- to fall as snow
= example: to fall as snow
